refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: device_names = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannels] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput, nbChannelsOutput] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput, nbChannelsOutput] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput, nbChannelsOutput, inputLatency] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput, nbChannelsOutput, lowInputLatency, lowOutputLatency] = pa_deviceinfo() [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput, nbChannelsOutput, lowInputLatency, lowOutputLatency, highInputLatency, highOutputLatency] = pa_deviceinfo()

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: [device_names, default_samplerate, nbChannelsInput, nbChannelsOutput, lowInputLatency, lowOutputLatency, highInputLatency, highOutputLatency] = pa_deviceinfo()
